mapper.select: SELECT EB.EDU_PART_SCHOOL, EL.EDU_SUBJECT, M.MEMBER_NAME, EL.EDU_ADDRESS, TO_CHAR(EL.EDU_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ES, TO_CHAR(EL.EDU_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') EE FROM EDU_BOOK EB JOIN EDU_LIST EL ON EB.EDU_ID = EL.EDU_ID JOIN MEMBER M ON EB.EDU_BOOK_ID = M.MEMBER_ID
SELECT * FROM EDU_LIST WHERE EDU_ID IN ( SELECT EDU_ID FROM EDU_BOOK EB JOIN MEMBER M ON EB.EDU_BOOK_ID = M.MEMBER_ID WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = #{abcd} )
